object.name: ActuatorTelemetry
object.description: Basic actuator telemetry received via servo channels.

field.name: Temperature
field.description: Temperature readout for each telemetry capable ESC.

field.name: Voltage
field.description: Average voltage over all telemetry capable ESCs.

field.name: Current
field.description: Current usage for each telemetry capable ESC.

field.name: Consumed
field.description: Total energy consumed from all telemetry capable ESCs.

field.name: eRPM
field.description: Electrical RPM for each telemetry capable ESC. Values are equivalent to a two pole motor, please convert accordingly (e.g. divide by 7 for your typical miniquad brushless motor.)
